uts.wsd.teamtwo.soap.client

Class ReviewClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • uts.wsd.teamtwo.soap.client.ReviewClient

  • public class ReviewClient
extends java.lang.Object
    The standalone application that communicates with the Reviews SOAP server. The class provides a program entry point (main()); it should be executed alone.
    Author:
    Deinyon L Davies
    See Also:
    ReviewSOAP
